name: Free Online Contract Multi-Version Comparison Tool - ATools
description: Free online contract multi-version comparison: Using baseline text as reference, compare multiple versions line-by-line and highlight additions/deletions, supports copying unified diff.
seoDescription: Free online contract multi-version comparison tool that supports pasting or uploading baseline contract text and multiple version texts for line-by-line difference comparison with highlighted additions/deletions, counts changes for each version, and supports copying unified diff results. Pure frontend local operation without data uploads, suitable for contract revision verification, clause change checking, and version management comparison.

ui.defaultBaseText:
Article 1 Party A...
Article 2 Party B...
ui.defaultVersionText:
Article 1 Party A...
Article 2 Party B (revised)...
Article 3 New clause...
ui.tip: Tip: This tool is suitable for quick 'version comparison/clause change' checks; for complex contracts, it's recommended to first digitize (copy body or OCR) then compare.
ui.pdfSupportHint: Tip: You can upload PDF contracts directlyâ€”we'll extract text locally for diffing (scanned images still require OCR).
